original_text: Whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.
korean_text: 손에 키를 들고 자기의 타작 마당을 정하게 하사 알곡은 모아 곳간에 들이고 쭉정이는 꺼지지 않는 불에 태우시리라

sentences.original_text: Whose fan is in his hand
and he will throughly purge his floor
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 타작마당을 철저히 청소할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and will gather the wheat into his garner
but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable
